channel.title: 🏢 Research Institute of Intelligent Complex Systems, Fudan University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Research Institute of Intelligent Complex Systems, Fudan University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Visual Pinwheel Center Act as Geometric Saliency Detector
item.description: Visual pinwheel centers in the cortex act as efficient geometric saliency detectors, responding faster and stronger to complex spatial textures than other structures.
